root: ^While I don’t want to be here, at least I can get a good grade!
^I don't want to be here either, especially not this late at night.
^You couldn't get a good grade studying by yourself?

c-0: ^I really coulse use the extra study time anyway.
c-1: ^Yeah, I can't believe the Professor insisted that we come in so late.
c-2: ^No... I'm just saying it's probably better to study with other people.
g-0: ^I mean, the school closes at 9:00 P.M. It's a bit strange that we'd be asked to meet hours after...
